sentences.en: He was told that the doors had been installed incorrectly.
sentences.cn: 他被告知房门安装不当。

sentences.en: The magazine suggested, incorrectly, that he was planning to announce his retirement.
sentences.cn: 该杂志错误地暗示说他正打算宣布退休。

sentences.en: In the same drawing, she incorrectly lumped together army and leaf-cutter ants.
sentences.cn: 在同一幅画中，她错误地把军队和切叶蚁混为一谈。
